report.title: List locations with postcode search.
report.description: Used for post code search on My Squares page. Also used for same functionality on events page.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false --Get the vice country for the square as it is included in the name label, this is stored in a custom attribute as it is faster than insecting on the fly. LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_id=l.id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #vice_county_location_attribute_id# AND lav.deleted=false --Determine whether square is excluded if needed LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavEx on lavEx.location_id=l.id AND lavEx.location_attribute_id=#excluded_square_attr_id# AND lavEx.deleted=false #joins# WHERE 1=1 AND #website_filter# AND (l.location_type_id=#core_square_type_id# OR l.location_type_id=#additional_square_type_id#) AND l.deleted=false AND (#distance_from_post_code# != 0 OR '#return_all_squares#'='true') #filters#
report.params:
l.location_type_id=#square_type_id_chosen_by_user#
--Not required, needed if you want the not_excluded and excluded columns to output correct data
st_dwithin(ST_GeomFromText('#post_code_geom#',3857), ST_Transform(l.centroid_geom,3857), #distance_from_post_code#)
LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavHistoric on lavHistoric.location_id=l.id AND lavHistoric.location_attribute_id=#historic_attr_id# AND lavHistoric.deleted=false (lavHistoric.id IS NULL OR lavHistoric.int_value = 0)

column.name: name
column.sql: case when '#pss_mode#'='0' then l.name || ' - ' || coalesce(lav.text_value,'#no_vice_county_found_message#') else l.name end

column.name: excluded
column.sql: case when lavEx.int_value = 1 then true else false end

column.name: not_excluded
column.sql: case when (lavEx.int_value != 1 OR lavEx.int_value IS NULL) then true else false end
